cards.heading: Easy AI Integration
cards.description: AI should work with your systems, not against them. We make integration seamless with Microsoft Semantic Kernel and Azure AI

cards.heading: Work Smarter, Not Harder
cards.description: Stop wasting time on repetitive tasks. AI automates workflows, streamlining emails, documents, and repetitive data entry

cards.heading: Smarter Business Decisions
cards.description: AI finds patterns in your data that dashboards miss. Predict sales, detect fraud, and optimize operations with deeper, actionable insights

cards.heading: Personalization at Scale
cards.description: Customers expect tailored experiences. We help you deliver AI-powered interactions that feel natural, relevant, and personal

blocks.heading: AI That Works for Your Business
blocks.description: AI isn’t the future—it’s the present. SSW helps you cut through the noise and apply AI where it matters, delivering real results.

features.heading: Microsoft AI Experts
features.description: Get AI right the first time with our expertise in Azure AI, Semantic Kernel, and more.

features.heading: Custom AI, Tailored to You
features.description: No one-size-fits-all models. We design AI solutions that align with your unique challenges and goals.

mediaConfiguration.altText: The Future of Business with AI: Automation, Intelligence, and Customer Relations

blocks.heading: YakShaver: Our In-House AI in Action
blocks.description: At SSW, we don’t just talk about AI, we build it. YakShaver is our custom solution that converts our tech meeting recordings into clear, actionable work items.

features.heading: Seamless Automation
features.description: No more manual documentation. YakShaver creates backlog items in Azure DevOps or GitHub with just a recorded conversation.

features.heading: AI That Understands Context
features.description: Using Whisper for speech-to-text and GPT-4o for structured outputs, it ensures accurate and detailed issue reports.

mediaConfiguration.altText: YakShaver - AI to make the perfect PBI in 30 seconds
